page.title: 07Batley Market
page.content: Batley Market is placed in the centre of Batley.It is next to a street called Commercial Street which is the main shopping centre. The stalls are placed on old cobble stones.In total there are 59 stalls on a Saturday and 69 on a Friday .Batley market also has its own toilets.It is an outdoor market. People who own the stalls come at about 7.15 a.m. and leave at 4.45p.m. The market starts when people start comming to buy things(about 7.15).The market sells things like most markets such as meats,poultry,sweets,grocery,things for pets,grocery and tripe.On non market days the market is used for a car park. The market is not far from the bus station and is near to the Police station,and the Post Office.
